latest_changelog.zh_cn: 测试修改了更新日志，如无必要可以不更新，这其实就是 1.0.3-BETA-3.1 测试结果相对稳定后发布的 release 版本
latest_changelog.en_us: Test modification of the update reminder; version is not necessary, just update a stable release version of 1.0.3-BETA-3.1.

latest_stable_changelog.zh_cn:
修复市民在铁轨上引起崩溃的问题，市民移动加速科技现在也可以作用到市民铁轨移动加速上。
2.修复了市民受伤判定可能引起崩溃的问题。
latest_stable_changelog.en_us:
Fixed a crash caused by citizens on rails. The citizen movement speed research now also applies to rail movement speed.
2.Fixed an issue where citizen injury checks could cause a crash.
